A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok\, there's a lot of BS out there. Here's the real deal\, according to...just me: this film is excellent and warrants multiple viewings (though multiple viewings are in no way required). It's not the fan service extravaganza I expected (The Force Awakens was\, and I loved it)\, but despite what some might say\, Luke continues to be the ultimate hero; humanized\, now\, to whatever extent that's possible for a semi-god in a galaxy far\, far away. \n\nJust plain great.
